amendment.description: To authorize a study of the program to assess sanitation and safety conditions at Bureau of Indian Affairs facilities that were constructed to provide affected Columbia River Treaty tribes access to traditional fishing grounds and make related improvements.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1638 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
